definition: to draw together/to place side by side (e.g. one's fingers, two halves of a torn sheet of paper etc)
and/furthermore/also/together with/(not) at all/simultaneously/to combine/to join/to merge
to gather together/to collect/to approach/to draw near to/to add/to sum up/to comb (hair)

sentences.english: Hold the fingers straight and then close them against the thumb.
sentences.chinese: 将四只手指竖直并拢并向大拇指方向闭合即可。

sentences.english: Legs closed, slightly tilted to one side。
sentences.chinese: 两腿并拢，轻微斜向一侧。

sentences.english: Put your fingers together and make your palm face to the top inside of your partner's godet.
sentences.chinese: 手指并拢把掌侧放在肩胛骨顶部的内侧。

sentences.english: Stand up straight with your feet together.
She is sitting at the foot of the divan, her feet together, her hands together in her lap.
sentences.chinese: 她坐在长沙发椅的末梢，两脚并拢，双手交叠膝上。

sentences.english: You walk into it. Feet together. Look at it.
sentences.chinese: 走进击球区，双脚并拢，看一眼目标。

sentences.english: Just sleep time is bipod and approach, head on top.
sentences.chinese: 刚睡的时候是两脚并拢，头趴在上面。

sentences.english: Because there's every reason to believe that the two technologies are converging in the near term future.
sentences.chinese: 因为我们有理由相信这两种技术会不断并拢。

sentences.english: Stand with feet together, arms extended like airplane wings.
sentences.chinese: 双腿并拢站立，双臂像飞机双翼样伸展。

sentences.english: Fold your palms and put your fore arms transversely on your partner's back.
sentences.chinese: 双掌并拢，把你的前臂横在伙伴背部的中间。

sentences.english: For all skills apart from straddle jumps, the legs should be kept together with the toes pointed.
sentences.chinese: 除做跨跃动作外，两腿都应并拢，脚尖伸直。

definition: the five fingers of one's hand
to bend/to curve around/curved/crooked/to wind/to warp
